title: Issue Permit for Confined Space Entry
description: A supervisor needs to issue a permit for a maintenance crew to enter a large tank (a confined space) to perform repairs.

tasks.description: Create a new permit to work request for confined space entry.
tasks.expected_outcome: A draft permit is created in the digital permit system.

tasks.description: Verify that all safety prerequisites are met, including isolating the tank, performing gas testing, and assigning a standby person.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system's checklist confirms all safety controls are in place.

tasks.description: Approve and issue the electronic permit, making it active for the work crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: The permit is issued and becomes active, allowing work to commence safely.
